name: Pad Woon Sen Recipe (Thai Glass Noodle Stir-Fry)
description: This pad woon sen recipe for Thai glass noodle stir-fry can be customized with your favorite vegetables and protein.

video.name: Pad woon sen is one of the best Thai stir-fries! #thaifood #thairecipes #thairecipe #foodies

recipeInstructions.text: Soak glass noodles in room temperature water until they are soft, following the package instructions. Drain well and cut them in half before adding them to the stir-fry.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak glass noodles in room temperature water until they are soft, following the package instructions. Drain well and cut them in half before adding them to the stir-fry.

recipeInstructions.text: Start by heating oil and sautéing garlic in a wok until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Start by heating oil and sautéing garlic in a wok until fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the prepped vegetables and stir-fry with the scrambled eggs until everything is well mixed and the vegetables are tender yet crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the prepped vegetables and stir-fry with the scrambled eggs until everything is well mixed and the vegetables are tender yet crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the soaked glass noodles and add the stir-fry sauces with sugar. Keep things moving until the noodles are well coated with the sauce and have softened yet still have a bite to them. Add the green onions near the end and use coriander for garnishing. Serve immediately. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in the soaked glass noodles and add the stir-fry sauces with sugar. Keep things moving until the noodles are well coated with the sauce and have softened yet still have a bite to them. Add the green onions near the end and use coriander for garnishing. Serve immediately. Enjoy!

keywords: glass noodle stir-fry, glass noodles, pad woon sen
